participant_1.background:
I go gambling in my spare time.
I have been retired for a years.
I enjoy mowing my lawn on sunny days.
I like to grill outdoors.
I move south during the winter.

participant_2.background:
I work from home.
I like to spend my money on cars.
I have never had a steady relationship.
I watch too much tv in spare time.
I go to the gym most days just to socialize.

content.text: Hi there! I'm retired and I love to gamble. What do you do for fun?
I work from home and I like to spend my money on cars.
That's cool. I've never been much of a car person. I prefer to spend my money on travel.
I like to travel too, but I don't have a lot of time for it.
I understand. I used to travel a lot when I was younger, but now I'm happy to stay put in my home state.
I'm not sure where I'll end up settling down. I like to move around a lot.
I'm the opposite. I've lived in the same place for most of my life.
I think it's important to experience different places and cultures.
I agree. It's definitely broadened my horizons.
Do you have any favorite travel destinations?
I love the Caribbean. I've been to Jamaica, Cuba, and the Bahamas.
Those are all beautiful places. I've only been to Jamaica, but I loved it.
Jamaica is great. I love the culture and the food.
I'm a big foodie, so I'm always looking for new places to try new food.
I'm the same way. I love exploring different cuisines.
I'm glad we agree on something.
